traditional: 實數
shíshù real number
qiánwǎng leave for; proceed towards; to go

traditional: 更換
gēnghuàn replace

traditional: 參數
cānshù a parameter
míngzi (a person's) name
zuòfǎ course of action; method of doing sth; practise; modus operandi
xíngshǐ exercise (a right etc)

traditional: 唯物主義
wéiwùzhǔyì materialism, philosophical doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality

traditional: 進展
jìnzhǎn to make headway; to make progress

traditional: 國王
guówáng king

traditional: 發言
fāyán statement; utterance

traditional: 調查研究
diàocháyánjiū investigate and discuss

traditional: 試管
shìguǎn test tube

traditional: 電離
diànlí ion; ionized (e.g. gas)

traditional: 傳送
chuánsòng to convey; to deliver

traditional: 呈現
chéngxiàn to appear; to emerge; present (a certain appearance); demonstrate
